description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding for use as music room (following demolition of existing garden outbuilding)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
0867_P02 - Existing and proposed block plan, 0867_P01_B - Existing and proposed plans, Email received on 20/10/2020
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwelling (number 166 Greenford Avenue).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 166 Greenford Avenue Hanwell  London W7 3QT only and not for any other use. The use as a music room shall also only occur between the hours of 09.00 - 22.00 only. Insulation as stated in the email received on 20/10/2020 shall also be inserted prior to use.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2016) as well as the Publication London Plan - 2020, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| No kitchen shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 3.5, 7.4-7.6 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| Sound insulation as stated in the email received from Terry White on 20/10/2020 shall be installed into the outbuildings walls and ceilings prior to the first use as a music room.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) as well as the Publication London Plan - 2020, and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
